# Welcome to `cohortED`

::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="40%"}
![](assets/img/cohortED_badge.png)
:::

::: {.column width="60%"}

`cohortED` is an R package for conducting cohort-based data analysis in education.

It helps researchers and analysts explore longitudinal trends, visualize student performance across time, and gain insights into educational progression using clean, consistent tools.
:::

:::
